document.title: Hot Topic: State and Federal Reimbursement Rates for Travel
document.abstract: For those cities that elected to reimburse for travel using the Federal Reimbursement Rates, the Federal Goverrnment has increased the vehicle-cents-per-mile reimbursement rate to 31.5 cents per mile, up from 31 cents per mile in 1996.
